Class Couch::Db
In: src/couchdb/db.rb
Parent: Object

The Db class represents a database on a CouchDb server

Use an instance of Db class to read and write Couch::Doc objects or to fetch a Couch::Table collection of document summary data from a particular database.

Use the class methods of Db to create and delete databases.

Methods

Store the document in the database

table(name, options = nil)

Get an entire table. Name must be in the format "design_doc_id:table_name"

options is a hash with any of the following values

key: one or more keys to return startkey: the start key to return endkey: the end key to return count: the max number of rows
